SELECT MONTH(o.order_time) AS month, blo.line_id AS lineID, SUM(o.order_money) AS total_order_money, SUM(o.order_num) AS total_order_num FROM belong_line_order blo JOIN `order` o ON blo.order_id = o.id WHERE blo.line_id = #{lineID} -- 使用传入的 lineID 参数 AND MONTH(o.order_time) = #{month} -- 使用传入的 month 参数 GROUP BY month, lineID;
